typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string,
		Column_12 as string,
		Column_13 as string,
		Column_14 as string,
		Column_15 as string,
		Column_16 as string,
		Column_17 as string,
		Column_18 as string,
		Column_19 as string,
		Column_20 as string,
		Column_21 as string,
		Column_22 as string,
		Column_23 as string,
		Column_24 as string,
		Column_25 as string,
		Column_26 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipLines: 1) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5,
		Column_6,
		Column_7,
		Column_8,
		Column_9,
		Column_10,
		Column_11,
		Column_12,
		Column_13,
		Column_14,
		Column_15,
		Column_16,
		Column_17,
		Column_18,
		Column_19,
		Column_20,
		Column_21,
		Column_22,
		Column_23,
		Column_24,
		Column_25,
		Column_26
	)) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		Lapsen_koko_nimi as string,
		{Ikä} as string,
		{Syntymäaika} as string,
		Lapsen_koko_nimi2 as string,
		{Ikä2} as string,
		{Syntymäaika2} as string,
		Varausnumero as string,
		Laiva1 as string,
		{Lähtöpäivä1} as string,
		{Mistä1} as string,
		Mihin1 as string,
		Laiva2 as string,
		{Lähtöpäivä2} as string,
		{Mistä2} as string,
		Mihin2 as string,
		Laiva3 as string,
		{Lähtöpäivä3} as string,
		{Mistä3} as string,
		Mihin3 as string,
		Huoltajan_nimi as string,
		Postiosoite as string,
		Puhelinnumero as string,
		Valtuutetun_nimi2 as string,
		Postiosoite2 as string,
		Puhelinnumero2 as string,
		{Paikka_ja_päivämäärä} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'table',
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	mapColumn(
		Lapsen_koko_nimi = Column_1,
		{Ikä} = Column_2,
		{Syntymäaika} = Column_3,
		Lapsen_koko_nimi2 = Column_4,
		{Ikä2} = Column_5,
		{Syntymäaika2} = Column_6,
		Varausnumero = Column_7,
		Laiva1 = Column_8,
		{Lähtöpäivä1} = Column_9,
		{Mistä1} = Column_10,
		Mihin1 = Column_11,
		Laiva2 = Column_12,
		{Lähtöpäivä2} = Column_13,
		{Mistä2} = Column_14,
		Mihin2 = Column_15,
		Laiva3 = Column_16,
		{Lähtöpäivä3} = Column_17,
		{Mistä3} = Column_18,
		Mihin3 = Column_19,
		Huoltajan_nimi = Column_20,
		Postiosoite = Column_21,
		Puhelinnumero = Column_22,
		Valtuutetun_nimi2 = Column_23,
		Postiosoite2 = Column_24,
		Puhelinnumero2 = Column_25,
		{Paikka_ja_päivämäärä} = Column_26
	)) ~> sink1
